text: Kuch log to kahen gay kay ashaab-e-kahaf teen thay aut chotha unn ka kuta tha. Kuch kahen gay kay panch thay aur chata unn ka kuta tha ghaib ki baton mein atkal (kay teer tukkay) chalatay hain kuch kahen gay woh saat hain aur aathwaa unn ka kuta hai. Aap keh dijiye kay mera perwerdigar unn ki tadaad ko ba-khoobi jannay wala hai unhen boht hi kum log jantay hain. Pus aap inn kay muqadmay mein sirf sirsari guftugoo hi keren aur inn mein say kissi say unn kay baray mein pooch gooch bhi na keren
